text: Batouri is a city in the East Region in Cameroon. It is the second largest city in the province by population, after the provincial capital Bertoua. About 33,500 people live there. It is near the border with the Central African Republic. Batouri has a tropical savanna climate (Aw in the KÃ¶ppen climate classification). Category:Cities in Cameroon
title: Batouri
